comment.label_en: Note: This information will be copied automatically to documents related to this medical device when they are created.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names = 'cd_md_managers' union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names = 'cd_md_managers' union select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_md_managers'

comment.label_en: These users will be responsible for managing the Device Information and Default Role settings in this form.

list.assistance_dql: select group_name from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names in ('cd_md') order by 1

comment.label_en: These users will be able to read this form and create documents related to this Device.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_coordinators' union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_coordinators' union select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_md_doc_coordinators'

comment.label_en: These users have the ability to manually change the status of documents created in relation to this Device.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_reviewers' union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_reviewers' union select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_md_doc_reviewers'

comment.label_en: These users will be prepopulated as Reviewers and/or co-Authors on Collaborative and Review workflows for documents created in relation to this Device.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_approvers' union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_approvers' union select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_md_doc_approvers'

comment.label_en: These users will be prepopulated as Approvers on workflows for documents created in relation to this Device.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_readers' union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_readers' union select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_md_doc_readers'

comment.label_en: These users will have Read Only Access to finalized documents created in relation to this Device.

list.assistance_dql: select groups_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_auditors' union select users_names from dm_group where any i_supergroups_names='cd_md_doc_auditors' union select group_name from dm_group where group_name = 'cd_md_doc_auditors'

comment.label_en: These users are responsible for carrying out internal audits on documents related to this Device.
Note: Changes to these settings will not affect existing documents - they will only apply to new documents.
